title: Sekai wa Nakajima ni Koi wo Suru!!
original_name: 世界は中島に恋をする!!
sinopse:
Among the billions of people in the world, I will find you.

She's a normal high school girl now, but a fateful encounter will turn her into an idol?! She sees a dream of falling in love, and will fall in love again.

Included one-shot:
Volume 4: Kobayashi ga Kawaisugite Tsurai!! Love-Love Bangai-hen
